message.body: Hey Dan, it's meg this is my number (still 717!) I will let you know if I make it to the county any time soon
Cool. I can't have my phone at work (they fire people for it). Only at breaks. The joys of pharmaceutical companies
I imagine you to be a good mom. You have the right personality for it. Me, no kids. I never really grew up. Haha
I try! Kids are really challenging. I don't always feel totally grown up either. Like this week for example, I'm on spring break!
Ha! I sometimes eat cookies for dinner
That's one tough thing about kids, you can never flake on food.
Her mind would explode if we shared a box of cookies for dinner
It's amazing I'm an adult
Being married is pretty adult
You've never seen us together;)
That's awesome : ) punk rock love
speaking of punk rock love...why no love for your duke st apt? I have great memories there
Oh to be young and dumb again. Haha.
Totally.
Where is philly are you? We did the philly naked bike ride in august. We also like going to new harmony or kingdom. Haven't been on south st in years

We live in west philly on Baltimore avenue. I was supposed to ride my bike to manyunk today but just woke up to downpour. I have an old paramount that I got in Seattle a few years ago. I heart my bike : )
Do you ever see the fresh prince?
I ride to work when possible. Usually when I'm within a 15mile radius but I've been 105miles from home for a while now. It's crappy but I have a 4person carpool
Nah the fresh prince moved somewhere on the west coast. I see a mural including him under the el tho

105 miles! Where are you going? I was riding my bike to Bryn Mawr but the route was gnarly, Lancaster ave turns into 40mph right when the bike lane disappears. I might start doing it again in the spring tho
I'm working in danville at a pharmaceutical plant. Probably until may unless I find something closer sooner. Kinda tired of waking up at 3:45.
Especially now that the weather will be getting nicer. I only worked 4 months last year so I guess I should just be happy to be working...right?
Dan works at Danville. Yeah work is work. I haven't worked since I got to Bryn Mawr because it is so tough there, but I know one day I will have to look for a job again and hate it
Working is for suckers. Does he work at the hospital? Who is this dan fellow? He has a nice name

It is quite nice, I'm not sure how it is pronounced tho. Dahhhhhnnn? Who knows. I want to go to grad school for maritime archaeology so hopefully when I am all done I will get a job on a boat and never step on dry land again
I'm pretty sure your legs are far too long to be on a boat.
I could touch the bottom even in the ocean. Spider girl
I bet you could. I'd like to see that actually
What's your drink of choice these days?
In the next few minutes it will be a coffee and a fresh squeezed orange juice. If I'm at the bar it's usually an IPA and or whiskey. Or champagne and St. Germaine, or really anything.
I'm not into most ipas. Back in Black is pretty good but I prefer porters and stouts
I like iced cream floats made from porters or stouts
Genesis milkshakes at isaacs made by zach (the gay bartender) are the best. I love those on a summer evening
Yum I've never had one, sounds good
I love so many different drinks on a summer evening. Jalapeño margaritas are good!
I'm also into absinthe. Have you ever tried it? It's about 140 proof
Yeah I actually drank a lot of it that my friend brought home from Denmark and then we went to a roller skating party, it was amazing
Hmmm...let me know if you want some when your in town. I love setting it up. It's almost like a religious event
Should I bring a sacrificial goat?
Hmmm. Probably not. We can build a fire and dance around it instead
Sounds perfect!
Ok...I'll leave it at that. Just say when
I'll have to find a place that I can build a fire too
Oh I thought you had a firepit in your backyard haha
I'll make one
Actually my yard is pretty small so maybe we'll have to go to the park and use one of the bbq pits
My boyfriend has a pretty sweet firepit in his backyard, maybe u guys just have to come to philly
I hear that. I've been listening to a lot of witch and sleep
Tis the time of the year. But now that spring is coming, I want to listen to Simon and garfunkle haha all over the place
Don't get me wrong, I have my jack johnson/josh ritter moments
Yeah I'm past making excuses, the heart wants what the heart wants.
I'm not sure if truer words have ever been spoken (errr...texted)
How long have you two been together?
Not very long, since last summer.
That's cool. Staci and I have been together since 2001. Married in 09
Remember makeoutclub.com? That's how we met
Wow!! That is crazy. I forgot all about that site. You guys are a totally solid couple!
We've had our problems but we've learned from them. We are not a typical couple in many ways...
It's awesome that you have figured out how to make it work. There's no such thing as typical couples, right?
Well we are more liberal than most
What does that mean?
We have a special agreement
So cryptic. Well, whatever works.
We have an open relationship. We have rules.
That's realistic. It's hard to be with only one person. But deception sucks, so that's really the only way to do it.
We have to know where the other is when they are with someone else. She does better than me (not that I'm keeping score) but that's nature of men and women
Are you still there? Haha
Sorry, I'm really hung over and just left bed to eat. So you think it's easier for women? But women outnumber men.
I think its easier for a married women to find a guy that will date her than vice versa
Most women don't want to get involved with someone that is attached (unless you go to swing clubs but we aren't club people though we do belong to one)

That kind of makes sense. Relationships are sort of a hassle. But it's nice to have someone to go to things like weddings with and have some one take care of you when you are sick. Without those perks I wouldn't bother forming relationships haha
Plus you picked a pretty conservative town to have a progressive lifestyle Hans
Hans=haha
Its not the easiest place to live this life but jobs in other towns are hard to find
I had a friend that once she found out she stopped talking to me. I'm not a pervert (mostly). I respect boundaries. It's not like I get on anything that moves
I've actually only had naked fun with 2 other women in the 12 years we've been together.

Yeah, my friend once said that in Lancaster you would be crucified if you slept with one person on Tuesday and another on Sunday. I've had a lot of crazy experiences, so it's hard for me to judge anyone.
I don't care if a guy wants to marry a guy. A hunter wants to shoot their dinner. Etc. As long as I can live my life as I want. Obviously laws are important for
Everybody's rights
I'm a live and let live kind of guy.
Jameson and french toast with bailey's maple syrup
Whoa! Wasted breakfast! I just had egg in a hole with humboldt fog and roasted butternut squash and yogurt
I just slepft off my breakfast
Yeah that's a breakfast that requires a nap
I was a bit tipsy. Kind of ruined my plans for the day. Wanted to ride around...getting fat
Yeah day drinking always seems like a fun way to start the day but it always ruins my plans
My insurance in $960 a month and is going up to $990 in may. Whatev!
Tell me something fun...it's just been a no good, rotten day.
I had to put out a fire! Finally, after 15years all that firewatch training paid off.
Ugh that is awful. I am so stressed out. Too many things due this week. Where was the fire?
At work. Ironworkers were torching some steel and some cardboard caught fire
Yikes! Dan to the rescue. I'm trying to formulate a debate suggesting that the Elgin marble should stay in the British museum and not be returned to Greece. It's hard to do without sounding racist
Is that what you really believe should happen? Or were you told to argue that side?
No it's just the assignment. I used their financial crisis against them
It's tough to agrue a point you don't truly believe. I was going to say about the $$. I called off today. It took me 4.5hrs to get home last night.
Whoa! So overtime and a four and a half hour commute? I would call off too. What are you going to do instead of work?
I need to start working out again. I've been in a rut since I started working again. There is so much to do when I get home because Staci works until 7:30
5 cats, 2 dogs, and frankie the have to get fed. Dogs walked. I do the dishes. Shower. By that time it's 7:30. Time to make dinner. Then bed
Yeah, time goes so much faster when you are older, what is that about? What does Staci do? You guys have a lot of pets
She works at the humane league. We have to chronic uti cats. One that needs an inhaler (yup). We have a 16yo jack russell that is on 5 meds for various things
Staci has a date tonight. Boring!
So stressed about school
Reports?
Not even. Giant life decisions
Oh...lay it on me girl
What decisions do you have to make?
Like my major and grad school and what country we are going to live in. And immediately, my summer internship. I've always studied social sciences so archaeology is really tough for me.
It's so removed from humanity, I don't feel like a riot grrl anymore
Hmmm. We're basically going through the same thing. Only for me it's switching careers.

It's tue, unions have become such a negative concept, and it's mostly based on stereotypes and prejudices. It's amazing how short sighted the human memory is, at the beginning of the last century we were fighting to get unions, to have weekends and worker
It's the same way that people blame poor families on food stamps but not giant corporations with subsidiaries.
We should have that drink together soon. :)
Get all drunk and mad and sing joe hill songs
Ha! F the system!
I want to hear you talk about this topic. I bet you get fired up
Yeh I'm kind of a class warrior. What are you up to this fine weekend?
My bff is in from texas (his dad died). Saw him last night. Tonight my friend Dream Weaver (aka ben weaver) is having a house warming party for his new house
Tomorrow, errands. You?

I'm on my way to a bridal shower now, gag. Then I have a meeting about a program I'm facilitating at school with a friend. We will probably drink beers tho. And then there is a basement show, my friends band is playing. Fun fun fun. Ella is at her grandmo
Wolavers coffee porter and dogfish head's miles davis
Dogfish 90 min imperial IPA, bells two hearted ale
Mmm. Bells. I heart oarsman
Oarsman, Linenkugels vanilla porter, wolavers coffee porter are easy top 10's for me
How's the show?
It was good, saw people I haven't seen for a while. Repotting plants today
I think I'm going to the park before it snows
Currently looking for a new job online
I'm looking for a summer internship and staying in sweatpants all day
Nate calls me lamby pajamy when I get in this mode
Do you "bah" a lot too?
Hmmm. What? All I got was a tiny black box...
It was an emoji of a lamb
Shame I missed it. Post ride snack: dark chocolate w/sea salt. I bit salty but still good
Are sweats your pjs?
Snow angels?
More like slush angels. Gray in every direction
Yeah. They sure have been getting it wrong lately
What did you do today
￼Here's a pic of my flensburger weizen. It's dee-lish. That probably sounded dirty
Were you up drinking beer at five in the morning?
Haha! That was last night. My bday present
Happy birthday! What did you do to celebrate?
Had a flensburger.
Had a flensburger.
Whoa, take it easy, not too much excitement!
I got up at 3:45 and had to do it again today. I was beat anyway. I'll make up for it if you ever come to town
What birthday is this?
No wonder you were so tired! This birthday I threw up next to the bed and it smelled like truffles. That's what happens when you mix fancy dinner with rays happy birthday bar
Ha! I've been there.
It's always trouble
When will you be in town
I want to buy you a drink or 3
A couple linenkugels, a yards brawler, some shots, and an angry orchard. Bday celebration complete.
Weekend warrior! Did you guys go out to celebrate?
Yes maam
It was a long day for me but a blast. Me and my two favorite ladies (no hanky panky)
It feels like a radiohead and shai hulud day
It's supposed to be really nice today, in the sixties!
Yeah. Stuck inside working at the chemical plant. In the old days I would burn today and ride but I need hours...so sad. #sellout
Yuck that sounds terrible. You gotta find a new gig
$33/hr in the check plus a $22/hr benefit package. I just need more work closer to home
What's goin' on lady
What's goin' on lady
Not much, grabbing a quick bite. Today is going to be a long day
How are you?
Meh but better than yesterday. I was sick. What are you having?
Blueberry juice and chickpea soup. And chips. I'm glad you are feeling better, what was wrong?
Head cold going around the job. My partner has been sick for days and was hovering over me when I told him to back off (politely). He didn't listen. I got sick
FRIDAY! Second best day of the work week...thursdays are better (payday)
What are your plans for the weekend?
Ride my bike as much as possible, drink excessively, sleep, eat good food
You?
Tomorrow im going to forage for ramps, Sunday doing a fundraiser run, tonight I'm going out on a date with my bf which I am very excited for
What kind of ramps?
Like the spring onion variety
Ah. I see. I thought you meant bike jumps
Haha, nope, that would be cool tho
Like Napoleon Dynamite
It's a manhattan kind of night
Like spring breakers?
Like old fashioned only no muddling
How was the rest of your weekend
It was good, kinda flew by. How was yours?
Fast but fun. Rode both days. Did some intervals but mostly relaxed riding. Went to the alley kat last night. Pizza and beer. Yum
Yum is right. There is an awesome pizza shop and brewery a couple blocks from my house, so good. Fig and bacon is my fav
While that sounds delicious, I haven't eaten meat in a long long time
Good for you! I was vegan for most of my twenties, but then I started eating dairy and then I couldn't explain not eating meat if I ate and used animal products
Too each their own. I was never militant about it
Yeah, whatever works. I mostly started when I found out I was going to Cambodia. I knew nothing would be vegetarian, and wanted to break my stomach in gently.
Smart. What's in store this week? I'm taking tomorrow off. 2pm dentist :(
It's all school, all week, as per usual. Only three and a half more weeks to go!
Are you getting a check up?
Yeah. A check up. Keep your fingers crossed.
Floss extra good tonight!
I fear it's too late for that. I'm horrible at flossing. I'll do it for a week and then totally ditch it until next check up
Aced the dentist. I felt like the hygienist was flirty. Didn't hate it
Who needs flossing?!
Maybe I have no teeth left to fill?
Do u have a platinum grill?
No. Unless you're into that sort of thing.
I'll get one
I think my teeth are filled with mercury. I'm losing my mind (the 5 concussions didn't help)
Five concussion!?!!!
My friend had four and his last one took him over a year to recover from. Also started getting OCD
I have a problem with short term memory. More specifically remembering what I'm doing
My dog's 16th bday party is tomorrow
Yes. Tomorrow. I bought a case of leinenkugel summer variety pack and sam smith organic cider. Plus I have a bottle of absinthe
Your dog gets crazy
So far though only 6 or 7 people rsvp'd out of 30 invites. Boring. It was last minute though (we weren't sure if he was going to make it)
That's a pretty huge party for a dog tho...
Skellington loved his party. He got all kinds of treats.
Did he get a new car?
Unfortunately we decided his legs were too short
Wise conclusion. Was the party fun?
Good time. We had a beanbag toss, beer, and cake. What more does one need?
That sounds so fun! Was it marrow flavored cake?
No no. Haha. Staci made her family's secret recipe or chocolate cake and vanilla icing. I leave the room when she is baking
I thought dogs couldn't have chocolate!
Oh. He didn't. We did. He had pig ears that our neighbor brought
Ah! Not bad. I wish I knew someone having a birthday soon
I could have another one...I have plenty of alcohol
I can't have any fun until school is done.. Two weeks to go!
I'm counting down the days...I hope you visit or we make it down
What's on the agenda this weekend? I have to do work stuff...keep my certifications up to date
That's not a weekend! I'm going to see Pinocchio with Ella on Saturday, other wise just working on final papers
That's not much of a weekend either
I know..I want to get everything done this week because I'm going to a wedding in balti next weekend
Neat. Friend or family? Staying or coming home?
Friends. We are going down Friday and coming home Sunday, with the wedding on Saturday. So excited to drink champagne and not think about ancient Iberia or Arabia!
Ha! Great. I hope you have a blast. His friends or yours?
Mutual, so it's going to be good. So stoked
That's the best. I don't like going to stacis friends weddings because I don't know anyone...vise versa
Did you get your papers finished?
Nooo so much to do still. How was your weekend?
Short but nice. Didn't do much except for class on saturday and my dads sunday (he moved back from his winter retreat)
Poll: would you pay to have sex with me?
Ummm no probably not. But I wouldn't pay to have sex w anyone, so...
Haha. Ok. I'm looking for a new career
Maybe you could get a webcam?
Oh? Maybe. That might be fun
How did it go?
Alcohol sick?
Yup. Mixing up too many things
Nice. Back to the grind?
Working hard. First paper is due in 24 hours
What's it on?
The presence of a prehistoric amber trade in the Iberian peninsula
Where is iberia?
Present day Spain and Portugal
I see.
How wuz ur weekend?
Ok. I got sick (for real) on saturday while I was out with my wife and my neighbor (I've had a crush on her for 6 years). We saw dreamgirls at the fulton
Did you vom? What is dream girls?
Head cold and lungs too. No vomiting. Dream girls is based on the supremes rise to fame
Oh no. Bummer. are u feeling better?
I'm still stuffy but I'm coming out of it.
They are saying we are going to 6 12 hour days or 7 10's. Ugh. Feast or friggin' famine
Yikes that's terrible! And you have to drive several hours there and back??
We may get a motel room
How long does that last? Hotel party!
Probably 4 weeks
Where were you this weekend? I saw your pic of FB
Took the beer bus to the Philadelphia union game. Celebrated being done with school by getting smashed
Nice. Do you know billy bennett? He's a huge soccer...err...football fan
No I don't think so. It was super fun, you guys should come for a game sometime. Beer bus is the way to go
I doubt staci would be into it. She doesn't like sports or beer!
Double bummer. I like futball because it moves quickly, the athletes have to be in shape, and there is lots of chanting in the stands.
You should go to a cyclocross race. They just made it against the rules this year for the racers to drink during the race
Haha, that's awesome. Is that downhill?
No. It's off-road racing on road bikes basically. From sept-december around here. Huge in europe. Seems they know a good time when they see one
Weird do you do it?
I used to. I was pretty good, won a few intermediate races but pro is extremely hard, less shenanigans. I only ever did one and my goal was to not get lapped
I did manage to stay on the lead lap.
I like shenanigans in sports. That's awesome. Let me know when there's a good race coming up!
Will do. It's a fall sport
My favorite season!
You could youtube cyclocross. They also do a money grab. Spectators put $$ on the course to see if racers will stop to pick it up
What! Can you hold out money and people will take it from your hand?
Yes but it's better when they put it on the barriers or just in the mud to make them earn it
The racers are like strippers? I don't get it, why would they stop? Is there a cash prize for winning?
Yes. Like strippers. The guys racing for the prize $$ rarely partake but the rest of the them don't care if they get 19th or 20th. Not much $$ in the sport
Ah ok, that's funny. Where do they race around here?
All over. There are a bunch of races in the philly burbs, delaware, jersey, and so on
Anything fun this weekend?
￼I have an ouchy.
Yikes what happened!!!
Went down at 25mph on the road
Are you ok? Your brain ok?
Mostly just my hip and bike. My pride a wee bit too. Haha
Ouch. How did it happen?
Wet roads. Fast turn. Over zealous
At least no vehicles were involved. Is yer bike totaled?
I broke a shifter (need parts to fix) and my derailleur hanger (I had a spare) but I was thinking about updating my stuff anyway. Running these parts for 5yrs
Still gimpy
Is school over?
Done done done, just dropped off my final final
Nice. Time to get smashed? Haha
Yeah I guess that's what time it is!
Let me know if you wander to lancaster sometime. I'll buy you one
I will be there somewhat soon, I have friends that just moved here from Olympia. Fun!
Cool. Keep me in the loop
